item.title: Event Dispatcher
item.description: Events When an event is dispatched, it’s identified by a unique name (e.g. foo.action), which any number of listeners might be listening to. An com.labudzinski.eventdispatcher.Event instance is also created and passed to all of the listeners. As you’ll see later, the Event object itself often contains data about the event being dispatched. The Dispatcher The dispatcher is the central object of the event dispatching system. Generally one dispatcher is created, which keeps a register of listeners.
